title: Domain Name Registration docs
introduction: Domain name registration is the process of registering a user-friendly domain name, which identifies one or more IP addresses. Leverage the docs and API reference to plan for, register, and renew domains.

section_recommended.title: Registering new domains
section_recommended.description: Register a new domain - either one at a time, or multiple domains at one time.

section_recommended.title: Renewing existing domains
section_recommended.description: To keep a registered domain active, it must be renewed before its expiration date.

section_recommended.title: Transferring an existing domain
section_recommended.description: After a domain has been registered, it can be transferred at any time.
